name: fugue
description: Fugue list CRDT implementations and benchmarks

scripts.start: npm run build && npm start -w crdt-benchmarks && npm run table -w crdt-benchmarks > results_table.md
scripts.B4x100: npm run B4x100 -w crdt-benchmarks && npm run table -w crdt-benchmarks > results_table.md
scripts.build: npm run build -w tree-fugue && npm run build -w tree-fugue-simple && npm run build -w list-fugue-simple
